name: Junknitor
description:
Do your parents complain that you don't do anything around the house? 
Would they like you to clean your room of the 352 cans of beer that have now conquered your bed too? 

Then this is the game for you! Have fun cleaning the offices of dirt and junkballs, but above all "prick your ears" and look around because a secret lurks hidden in your past.

Controls

Right Click - Suck in the objects/Junk
Right Click (Hold) - Maintain object on the vacuum
Left Click - Clean with Water
Left Click (with an Object stuck) - Throw the Objcet
